price: Say, “If the Most Compassionate truly had a son, I would be the first of [his] worshipers[30].”
arabic: قُلۡ إِن كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَلَدٞ فَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡعَٰبِدِينَ
footnotes: [30] Or I would be the first to approve it, as I obey Him in everything; whereas I deny that, for He has no offspring.
